subject: CNN Breaking News
body:
-- Preacher's wife Mary Winkler, who killed her husband with a shotgun blast to the back as he lay in bed, is sentenced to three years -- 210 days in prison and the rest on probation.

Watch the latest video now on CNN.com. Access at http://CNN.com. CNN - The most trusted name in news.

>+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=
Hillary Clinton, Barack Obama, and John Edwards discuss whether
faith, values and politics can co-exist. A special encore
presentation: "Faith and Politics" tonight at 8 ET.
http://www.cnn.com/elections
